mapper.select: select r_no, cr_no, cr_name, mc_name, mc_tel, r_date, r_price, r_revstatus, r_cancel from member_customer mc,(select r_no, cr_no, cr_name, mc_id, r_date, r_price, r_revstatus, r_cancel from (select r_no, cs_no, r.cr_no, cr_name, mc_id, r_date, r_price, r_revstatus, r_cancel from reservation r, camping_room cr where r.cr_no = cr.cr_no and cs_no=#{cs_no} order by r_date desc) where rownum <= 3) a where mc.mc_id = a.mc_id order by r_date desc
mapper.update: update reservation set r_revstatus = 1 where r_no = #{r_no}
update reservation set r_cancel = 2 where r_no = #{r_no}
mapper.select: select cr.cr_name, r_no, mc_name, mc_tel, r_date, r_checkin, r_price, r_revstatus, r_cancel from camping_room cr, reservation r, member_customer mc where cr.cr_no = r.cr_no and r.mc_id = mc.mc_id and cs_no=#{cs_no} order by r_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into reservation values(reservation_seq.nextval, to_date(#{checkin},'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{checkout},'yyyy-mm-dd'), sysdate, #{price}, #{payment}, 0, 0, #{cr_no}, #{mc_id})
mapper.select: select r_no from reservation where cr_no=#{cr_no} and r_checkin=to_date(#{checkin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select * from camping_room where cs_no=#{cs_no} and cr_type=#{campingType}

select cs_no, cs_name, cs_tel, cs_addr_head, cs_addr_remain, cs_url, cs_account, cs_camp_fname, cs_map_fname, cs_glamping_cnt, cs_caravan_cnt, cs_autocamping_cnt, cs_theme, cs_fac, cs_detail, mb_id from camping_spot where cs_no = #{cs_no}

select cs_name name, A.cs_no no, A.price price, A.avg rate, cs_addr_head addr_head, cs_addr_remain addr_remain, cs_detail detail, cs_tel tel, cs_theme theme, cs_fac fac, cs_camp_fname camp_fname from (select cr.cs_no cs_no, min(cr_price) price, avg(cre_rate) avg from camping_room cr, camping_review cre where cr.cs_no = cre.cs_no
and cr_type=#{campingType}
group by cr.cs_no) A, camping_spot cs where A.cs_no = cs.cs_no and cs.cs_no = #{no}
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme1} || '%'
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme2} || '%'
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme3} || '%'
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme4} || '%'
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme5} || '%'
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme6} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility1} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility2} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility3} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility4} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility5} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility6} || '%'
and A.price >= #{lowPrice}
and A.price <= #{highPrice}

select distinct cs.cs_no no from camping_spot cs, (select cr_no, cs_no from camping_room
where cr_type = #{campingType}
minus select cr_no, cs_no from reserve_search where rs_date = to_date(#{validDate1},'yyyy-mm-dd')
minus select cr_no, cs_no from reserve_search where rs_date = to_date(#{validDate2},'yyyy-mm-dd')
minus select cr_no, cs_no from reserve_search where rs_date = to_date(#{validDate3},'yyyy-mm-dd')
minus select cr_no, cs_no from reserve_search where rs_date = to_date(#{validDate4},'yyyy-mm-dd')
) A where A.cs_no = cs.cs_no
and ( cs_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or cs_addr_head like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
select mc_point from member_customer where mc_id = #{mc_id}
